title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) with a REST API, CLI, and model library.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node & browser).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama (sync & async, PyPI package).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (models, chats, uploads, admin).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: Official VS Code extension: chat & generate code with any Ollama model.

title: ollama-gradle-plugin
summary: Gradle plugin to download and run Ollama models during JVM builds/tests.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama (Spring Boot starters included).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators & embedders.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats via Ollama models and supports slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling options.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package: JavaScript client for Ollama (same repo as ollama-js).

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package: Python client for Ollama (same repo as ollama-python).

title: r/ollama – Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for model announcements, troubleshooting, and integrations.
